plot outline: Gooli is a Kannada action film, directed by P. Sathya, released in 2008. It stars Sudeep, Mamta Mohandas in lead roles.The central character Ghooli (Sudeep) is an uneducated, rude youngster and deadly merciless cruel rowdy with whom a girl named Ramya (Mamta) accidentally falls in love by seeing his pure and unadulterated heart. Ramya continues to keep in touch with Ghooli
title: Gooli
plot: _Gooli_ (qv) is a Kannada action film, directed by P. Sathya, released in 2008. It stars Sudeep, Mamta Mohandas in lead roles.The central character Ghooli (Sudeep) is an uneducated, rude youngster and deadly merciless cruel rowdy with whom a girl named Ramya (Mamta) accidentally falls in love by seeing his pure and unadulterated heart. Ramya continues to keep in touch with Ghooli
